mapper.select: SELECT tc,deliveryArea,telephone,state FROM transportCenterInfo WHERE state = '1'
SELECT id, dis.tc, tci.deliveryArea , dis.staffName , dis.staffPhoneNum , dis.state FROM deliveryInstallationStaff dis INNER JOIN transportCenterInfo tci using (tc)

SELECT dis.id ,CASE WHEN cnt IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE cnt END AS cnt FROM deliveryInstallationStaff dis LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT deliveryStaffId , count(id) AS cnt FROM deliveryInfo WHERE tc='100' AND expectedDeliveryDt =#{expectedDt} GROUP BY deliveryStaffId) AS B ON B.deliveryStaffId = dis.id WHERE B.cnt < 5 OR B.cnt IS NULL LIMIT 1
